sentences.sContent: If we were moving on the tangent plane, this would be an actual equality.
sentences.sContent_eng: If we were moving on the tangent plane, this would be an actual equality.
sentences.sCn: 如果我们在切平面上移动,这将会是一个真正的等式。

sentences.sContent: If you want strict equalities in approximations means that we replace the function by its tangent approximation.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you want strict equalities in approximations means that we replace the function by its tangent approximation.
sentences.sCn: 如果你想要严格的近似等式,那就意味着我们要用切线逼近来取代原函数。

synos.tran: [数]切线的，相切的；接触的；离题的

phrases.pCn: 切线模量，切线模数；正切模量；地基应力和变形切线模量

words.tran: [数] 切线的，[数] 正切的；离题的，扯远的

trans.tranCn: 切线的，相切的；接触的；离题的

trans.tranOther: a straight line that touches the outside of a curve but does not cut across it
